author: Zach LaChance
description: American Airlines has grounded and removed multiple pilots who were “caught celebrating” the assassination of Charlie Kirk, Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy announced. “Pilots who were caught celebrating the assassination of Charlie Kirk have been immediately grounded and removed from service by @AmericanAir. This behavior is disgusting and they should be fired. Any company responsible for […]
title: American Airlines removes pilots who were ‘caught celebrating’ Kirk’s death

author: Ross O'Keefe
description: The funeral for the late Charlie Kirk will be held in Glendale, Arizona, at State Farm Stadium on Sept. 21, Turning Point USA announced on Saturday. “Join us in celebrating the remarkable life and enduring legacy of Charlie Kirk, an American legend. The morning of Sunday, September 21, at State Farm Stadium, home of the […]
title: Charlie Kirk’s funeral to be held in Glendale, Arizona on Sept. 21

author: Ross O'Keefe
description: Four of the late Turning Point USA co-founder Charlie Kirk‘s books have rocketed up Amazon’s bestseller list after his death. One of the books, “Stop, in the Name of God: Why Honoring the Sabbath Will Transform Your Life,” hasn’t been released yet, but is No. 2 on the list. The book is set to come […]
title: Charlie Kirk’s books rise on Amazon bestseller list posthumously

author: Joe Concha
description: In Focus delivers deeper coverage of the political, cultural, and ideological issues shaping America. Published daily by senior writers and experts, these in-depth pieces go beyond the headlines to give readers the full picture. You can find our full list of In Focus pieces here. The date was October 29, 2001. President George W. Bush was […]
title: After Kirk assassination, legacy media, Democrats hit another low point

author: Kaelan Deese and Ross O'Keefe
description: The late Charlie Kirk’s alleged shooter Tyler Robinson lived with a transgender-identifying partner, a source familiar confirmed to the Washington Examiner. Robinson’s roommate is a biological male who identifies as a female, and is cooperating with the FBI on their investigation. The bureau had texts between the shooter and the person that helped them confirm […]
title: Alleged Kirk shooter Tyler Robinson lived with transgender partner

author: Peter Laffin
description: I’m haunted, as many are, by the prospect that we may have lost our country for good this week.  In his column on Friday, Washington Examiner Editor-in-Chief Hugo Gurdon contrasted the assassination of Charlie Kirk with the attempted assassination of President Donald Trump in Butler last year. The latter sparked a MAGA renaissance, while Kirk’s […]
title: After Kirk’s death, scales fall from America’s eyes

author: Sydney Topf
description: Office Depot fired an employee on Friday, after a video went viral on social media showing a worker refusing to print photos of Charlie Kirk for a vigil in his honor.  Kirk, the founder and CEO of Turning Point USA, was shot and killed on Wednesday while speaking at an event at Utah Valley University. […]
title: Office Depot fires employee over refusal to print Charlie Kirk vigil posters

author: Paul Bedard
description: It’s been happening for decades, and in the wake of Charlie Kirk’s assassination, Washington, D.C., has finally shown that it has no appetite for unity, only fight. President Donald Trump, himself an assassination target — twice — said “radicals” on both sides need to calm down. But on Fox News, he added, “The radicals on […]
title: Washington has become leaderless on unity: White House Report Card

author: Ross O'Keefe
description: President Donald Trump on Saturday set conditions for the United States to unleash “major sanctions” on Russia. He asked NATO countries to stop buying oil from Russia in order for the U.S. to follow through on the sanctions. “As you know, NATO’S commitment to WIN has been far less than 100%, and the purchase of […]
title: Trump ready for ‘major sanctions on Russia’ over its ‘RIDICULOUS WAR’ against Ukraine

author: Joseph Nepomuceno
description: Russian drones entered Polish airspace early on Wednesday, leading NATO aircraft to shoot them down. This incident was the first time that NATO forces had to directly engage Russian aircraft in the organization’s history. The Ukraine war has seen the widespread adoption of drones from both sides. Russian drones have been hammering Ukrainian cities for […]
title: The Ukraine war accelerates the international drone arms race

author: Ross O'Keefe
description: A federal appeals court ruled on Friday to allow the Trump administration to go forward with stripping protections away from around 430,000 migrants from Cuba, Haiti, Nicaragua, and Venezuela. A stay had been issued by a district court. “We recognize the risks of irreparable harm persuasively laid out in the district court’s order: that parolees […]
title: Appeals court allows Trump administration to end legal protection for over 400,000 immigrants

author: Ross O'Keefe
description: New York City Mayor Eric Adams on Friday slammed the media for producing stories that hurt “his ability to campaign.” Adams is trying to beat out Democratic nominee for mayor Zohran Mamdani, Republican Curtis Sliwa, and Independent former Gov. Andrew Cuomo to stay in Gracie Mansion. “All these rumors, all these lies. Folks had me […]
title: Adams blames media for ‘hurting my ability to campaign’

author: Gabrielle M. Etzel
description: In Focus delivers deeper coverage of the political, cultural, and ideological issues shaping America. Published daily by senior writers and experts, these in-depth pieces go beyond the headlines to give readers the full picture. You can find our full list of In Focus pieces here. Statues of angels and religious icons decorate the main examination room, […]
title: Catholic reproductive health catches eye of Trump administration: Inside a NaPro clinic

author: Lauren Green
description: Just days into his Senate campaign, James Talarico is making his Christian faith a centerpiece of what will be an uphill battle to strip one of Texas’s Senate seats out of the hands of Republicans. On Tuesday, Talarico launched his bid to challenge Sen. John Cornyn (R-TX) with a campaign video that emphasized his Presbyterian […]
title: Democrat James Talarico leans into faith in Senate bid to flip Texas red

author: Asher Notheis
description: October’s Supplemental Security Income payments, worth up to $967, will be issued to recipients in 18 days. Most SSI payments are issued on the first of every month, including October. However, the following November payment will be issued on Oct. 31, since Nov. 1 falls on a weekend this year. Beneficiaries are individuals with limited […]
title: October Social Security direct payment worth $967 goes out in 18 days

author: Asher Notheis
description: The second round of September Social Security payments for retirees aged 70 and above, now capped at $5,108, will be issued in four days. When will checks arrive? Retirees born between the 11th and 20th of a month will receive this payment on Wednesday.  The first round of payments was issued on Sept. 10 for […]
title: Second round of September Social Security payments issue in four days

author: Caleb Fuller
description: Lost in today’s noisy trade debates is a simple but powerful truth: There are only four ways to get what you want. You can receive a gift, steal it, make it, or trade for it. That’s it. Manna from heaven worked for the ancient Israelites, but in our vale of tears, scarcity implies we must […]
title: Free trade is the only way to prosperity

author: Dan Backer
description: Teresa Ribera, a Spanish socialist who serves as executive vice president of the European Commission, threatened to throw out Europe’s trade deal with the United States in response to the Trump administration’s insistence that the European Union loosen its tech regulations. She even threatened to renege on Europe’s commitment to purchase $750 billion worth of American energy. […]
title: Is Trump Big Tech’s protector or prosecutor?

author: Mabinty Quarshie
description: As President Donald Trump campaigned for the White House during the 2024 cycle, he was empathetic to many people’s top concerns: the economy and its effect on their families. “Starting on Day One, we will end inflation and make America affordable again, to bring down the prices of all goods,” Trump told supporters at a […]
title: Tepid economy could be thorn in Trump administration’s desire for baby boom

author: Brad Polumbo
description: “Charlie Kirk has been politically violent since he stepped in the game. That man is anti-trans, anti-women, anti-black people, anti-immigrants, and then some. He has been politically violent for 10-15 years now!”  That’s how one left-wing TikTok influencer justified the bloody assassination of MAGA superstar Charlie Kirk. They did so in a viral video that […]
title: Words are not violence

author: Washington Examiner
description: The Nation’s Report Card, released last week, shows the K-12 school system as bad and getting worse. A record 32% of high school seniors cannot read proficiently, and almost half cannot do basic math. Fourth and eighth-grade math and reading scores also fell, continuing a collapse that began before the COVID-19 school closures.  The new […]
title: Disastrous test scores show schools need to get back to basics

author: Tudor Dixon
description: Charlie Kirk was shockingly assassinated on the Utah Valley University campus earlier this week. A giant among conservatives, he was also a man of great faith, husband, son, and father. I run my eyes over the word “assassinated,” but my mind still cannot catch up with what my eyes have processed. My heart is heavy. Like […]
title: God, family, life, and freedom were Charlie Kirk’s message

author: Raphael Rosen
description: As New York City‘s mayoral race ossifies, with the leading candidates all short of a clear majority, the city, despite its lackluster choices for leaders, is still thriving. In Central Park, trees tower, statues shine, and more than 400 species of birds sing. On Manhattan’s avenues, sidewalks teem, stores bustle, and towers rise, sentinels over […]
title: New York City needs depolarization

author: Maydeen Merino
description: President Donald Trump’s move to eliminate tax credits meant to help homeowners afford energy-efficient improvements could undermine his own pledge to lower energy costs.  As part of Trump’s One Big Beautiful Bill Act, it repealed more than $500 billion of former President Joe Biden’s Inflation Reduction Act clean energy tax credits, including incentives for homeowners […]
title: Trump’s tax credit cuts could undermine pledge to lower energy costs

author: Mike Brest
description: Secretary of State Marco Rubio condemned China’s recently announced plan to establish a nature reserve on one of the most hotly contested shoals in the South China Sea, which rival claimant the Philippines has already protested. The Chinese government approved a proposal on Wednesday to create a national nature reserve at Scarborough Shoal, which its National Forestry […]
title: Why China wants to build a nature reserve in the South China Sea

author: Ross O'Keefe
description: White House adviser Stephen Miller says the late Charlie Kirk’s last message to him was to “dismantle” the radical left. Miller says that he will oblige with Kirk’s request. “The last message that Charlie Kirk gave to me before he joined his creator in heaven was he said that we have to dismantle and take […]
title: Charlie Kirk’s last message to Stephen Miller: Dismantle the radical left

author: Ross O'Keefe
description: A new website called “Charlie’s Murderers” is seeking to expose those who are “supporting political violence online.” The website lists the names and occupations of those celebrating the late Charlie Kirk’s death. It’s unclear who owns the website, which says it is not a “doxxing” platform. “This website is a lawful data aggregator of publicly […]
title: Website ‘Charlie’s Murderers’ exposes Kirk’s posthumous critics

author: Ross O'Keefe
description: Charlie Kirk’s widow, Erika, expressed defiance and sorrow in a public message Friday night as she vowed to continue her husband’s movement at Turning Point USA. An assassin shot and killed Charlie Kirk earlier this week at Utah Valley University. “They killed Charlie because he preached a message of patriotism, faith, and God’s merciful love. […]
title: Charlie Kirk’s widow tells America: ‘You have no idea what you have unleashed’

author: Ross O'Keefe
description: The widow of the late Charlie Kirk, Erika Kirk, will speak around 8:15 p.m. Friday. TRUMP AND VANCE LEAD MOURNING AFTER CHARLIE KIRK KILLED IN UTAH It will be the first public speech for Kirk’s widow since his death earlier this week. Kirk’s alleged killer, Tyler Robinson, was caught earlier Friday. Robinson allegedly shot and […]
title: WATCH LIVE: Erika Kirk, widow of Charlie Kirk, gives speech
